front.title: XML Configuration format for DHCPv6 Servers

abstract.t: This memo describes an Extensible Markup Language (XML) schema forspecifying configuration information for Dynamic Host ConfigurationProtocol for IPv6 (DHCPv6) Servers.Requirements LanguageThe key words "MUST", "MUST NOT", "REQUIRED", "SHALL", "SHALL NOT","SHOULD", "SHOULD NOT", "RECOMMENDED", "MAY", and "OPTIONAL" in thisdocument are to be interpreted as described in RFC 2119 [RFC2119].
